name: Крем EVO laboratoires Пантенол универсальный 46мл
ingredients: Aqua, Panthenol, Sorbitol, Paraffinum Liquidum, Dimethicone, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol (and) Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Acrylates/Vinyl Isodecanoate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Tetradibutyl Pentaerithrityl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid.
